title: Fish Farm & Vanilla Plantation For Sale
text: Questions Business Summary Riverside Farm with Vanilla Plantation For Sale For $475,000! The vanilla plantation itself is maintained as a park with a small vanilla shop offering products for visiting tourists. 14 acres is valued at $195,000. and the 7.7 acres with 12 fishponds (in production and offer the possibility for commercial fish production of 50 tons tilapia annually) is valued at $295,000 and for both plots together $475,000. Both lots are situated on the river with a small waterfall where a natural pool between rocks invites you to swim all the year around.The house is in the shade of tropical fruit trees (coconut, citrus, mango, banana, papaya, lychee, chocolate, passion fruit, etc.) + a massive stone-house of 60sqm is perched on a hill with excellent views. The other lot of 15 acres has a vanilla-cocoa-plantation with 1500 vanilla plants, suspension bridges, small riverside stone house (25 sq) and a wooden house (50 sq) with a thatched roof and built on stilts offers you a truly tropical living or traveling experience. The property has an elevation of 75 meters over ocean-level. The water temperature is a constant 24 degrees Celsius. A university-study, made some years ago, confirmed that these are the best conditions for a fish farm. The production of one kilo tilapia (for example) cost $2.00. The market price in Costa Rica is $ 5.00 per kilo for live fish. The vanilla crop has already started producing. averaging a harvest about 330 kg of fermented vanilla per year. Together with the property, Owner states that he could hand over the registered company, the rights on the web-domain and states that all commercial activities permits are already in place with the municipality, ministry of agriculture and the Ministry of Health. The property is reached by vehicle all the year, is connected to the public grid and has phone and internet reception. You can buy each lot separately or both together. Each lot a dream, together paradise!
